description: Comprehensive configuration profiles, policies, CSP/GPO settings, and MDM management preferences

group_policy_registry.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\%' AND data != '';
group_policy_registry.description: Group Policy settings from registry with full path information

mdm_configuration_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\%' AND name != '';

intune_policy_manager.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device%' AND type = 'subkey';
intune_policy_manager.description: Intune PolicyManager current device policy areas

intune_enrollment_info.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Enrollments\%' AND name != '';

intune_management_extensions.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\IntuneManagementExtension\%' AND name != '';

csp_policy_configurations.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\providers\%' AND data != '';

oma_uri_settings.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE (path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\%' OR path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\user\%') AND name LIKE '%OMA-URI%';

windows_defender_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender\%' AND data != '';

firewall_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\WindowsFirewall\%' AND data != '';

update_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsUpdate\%' AND data != '';

bitlocker_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\FVE\%' AND data != '';

user_account_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System\%' AND data != '';
user_account_policies.description: User account control and security policies

power_management_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Power\%' AND data != '';

edge_browser_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\%' AND data != '';

chrome_browser_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Google\Chrome\%' AND data != '';

office_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Office\%' AND data != '';

app_locker_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\SrpV2\%' AND data != '';

credential_guard_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\DeviceGuard\%' AND data != '';

security_compliance_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\DeviceCompliance\%' AND name != '';

device_configuration_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device' AND type = 'subkey';
device_configuration_policies.description: Device configuration policy areas from MDM

endpoint_protection_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\Defender\%' AND name NOT LIKE '%_ProviderSet' AND name NOT LIKE '%_WinningProvider' AND name NOT LIKE '%_LastWrite' AND data != '';

settings_catalog_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\SettingsCatalog\%' AND name != '';

administrative_templates.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\ADMX\%' AND name != '';

user_configuration_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\%' AND name != '';

wip_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\WindowsInformationProtection\%' AND name != '';

vpn_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\VPN\%' AND name != '';

wifi_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\WiFi\%' AND name != '';

certificate_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\Certificates\%' AND name != '';

kiosk_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\AssignedAccess\%' AND name != '';
kiosk_policies.description: Kiosk mode and assigned access policies

intune_defender_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\Defender\%' AND data != '';
intune_defender_policies.description: Detailed Windows Defender policies from Intune

intune_application_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\ApplicationManagement\%' AND data != '';

intune_browser_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\Browser\%' AND data != '';

intune_privacy_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\Privacy\%' AND data != '';
intune_privacy_policies.description: Privacy and data collection policies from Intune

intune_security_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\Security\%' AND data != '';

intune_dataprotection_policies.query: SELECT path, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\PolicyManager\current\device\DataProtection\%' AND data != '';
intune_dataprotection_policies.description: Data protection and WIP policies from Intune
